title: I Became A Virtuous Wife and Loving Mother in another Cultivation World - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Historical   Romance   Slice of Life   Xuanhuan   Yaoi
tags: Adopted Children   Arranged Marriage   Childcare   Clever Protagonist   Cold Love Interests   Couple Growth   Cultivation   Cute Children   Death of Loved Ones   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   Doting Older Siblings   Doting Parents   Familial Love   Handsome Male Lead   Hated Protagonist   Mpreg   Overprotective Siblings   Proactive Protagonist   Shameless Protagonist   Sibling's Care   Siblings Not Related by Blood   Slow Romance   Strong Love Interests   Time Travel   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Jin Yuanbao   金元宝
description:
After looking at a handsome man’s picture, he has transmigrated into another world. Rong Yi looked up at the sky, speechless. How unlucky could he be to have transmigrated into a loser + sissy’s body…

What’s worse, the original master of this body has been married to a man! And the worst thing is…

Rong Yi takes a deep breath and lowers his head to look at his chest! Flat! Check! Then he pulls open his pants and luckily see his ‘brother’ is still there, feeling much relieved…

He said to the little cute kid, “What did you say? Say it again.”

…>
